org.pragmaticminds.crunch.chronicle.consumers

Interface ConsumerManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JdbcConsumerManager, MemoryManager

    public interface ConsumerManager
extends AutoCloseable, Serializable
    Stores Offsets and returns them on request
    Author:
    julian Created by julian on 16.08.18

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acknowledgeOffset(String consumer, long offset, boolean useAcknowledgeRate)
      Acknowledges, i.e., stores the offset persistend
      long getOffset(String consumer)
      Returns the offset associated with the given consumer

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • getOffset

        long getOffset(String consumer)
        Returns the offset associated with the given consumer
        Parameters:
        consumer - Name of the consumer
        Returns:
        Offset of the consumer or -1 if no offset is stored

      • acknowledgeOffset

        void acknowledgeOffset(String consumer,
                       long offset,
                       boolean useAcknowledgeRate)
        Acknowledges, i.e., stores the offset persistend
        Parameters:
        consumer - name of the consumer
        offset - offset to store
        useAcknowledgeRate - if true, only acknowledge when count reaches given rate, otherwise always acknowledge
